metadata.name: Execution of Suspicious File Type Extension
metadata.comment: Detects whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an ".exe" (or other known executable extension) file. This can be caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process. This rule might require some initial baselining to align with some third party tooling in the user environment.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.bin')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.cgi')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.com')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.scr')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.tmp'))) AND NOT (lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('system', 'registry', 'memcompression', 'vmmem') OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\installer\\msi')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\driverstore\\filerepository\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\config.msi\\')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.rbf')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.rbs'))) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\$extend\\$deleted\\')) OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('-', '') OR process.name is null) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower(':\\programdata\\avira\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('nvidia\\nvbackend\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.dat')) OR (contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\winpakpro\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\winpakpro\\'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('.ngn')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\myq\\server\\pcltool.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\myq\\server\\pcltool.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\packages\\')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\localstate\\rootfs\\')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\lzma_exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\program files\\mozilla firefox\\')) OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\services.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('com.docker.service'))))

output.summary: Detects whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an ".exe" (or other known executable extension) file. This can be caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process. This rule might require some initial baselining to align with some third party tooling in the user environment.
